title: Kirill Akilov
text:
Kirill Igorevich Akilov (; born 12 June 1989) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played two seasons in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Sibir%20Novosibirsk">FC Sibir Novosibirsk</a> and <a href="FC%20Khimki">FC Khimki</a>.
